ygData.subject: Cindra's Charisma song
ygData.msgSnippet: I had been hunting orcs around in Oasys for some time. A last week (while I was 16) I was soloing and the only place where I could find orcs was in camp 1. but
ygData.messageBody:
I had been hunting orcs around in Oasys for some time. A last week (while I
was 16) I was soloing and the only place where I could find orcs was in
camp 1. but there were 4 of them (certain death...), so I decided to try
something different...
I used the charismatic carrilon on 3 of them, bringing their factions from
"ready to attack" to "indiferent" con, then I just ran through the camp and
got a safe and nice pull.

Have any of you guys done this?
I have never heard anything concerning this strategy on this list...
Hope I have added something good.

Ericka. 18th song bardess on prexus (camping catman people in wisps Island
in eruds Crossing)
